name: Mini Pokemon
description:
*In this Task you will be looking at a minimal implementation of the game Pokemon.*

**Goal:**      
We want to calculate the optimal move to use given an attacking pokemon,
and a defending pokemon.
_____________

**Description:**      
A pokemon has a list of moves it can use.     
Pokemon and moves posess types.     
Some types are more effective against other types.      

A *fire-attack* against a *grass-pokemon* is effective.     
A *water-attack* against a *grass-pokemon* is ineffective.     
A complete effectiveness description is further below.     

Each pokemon can learn a vareity of moves.     
The goal of this exercise is to find the best move to use against an oponent.
_____________

**Task:**

Complete the function `get_move()` so that the resulting Move is the best move
against the given oponent.    
If two moves are equally good, use the one with the lower `moves` list index.


**Effectiveness:**
```
Water beats Fire
Fire  beats Grass
Grass beats Water

Water is neutral on Water
Fire  is neutral on Fire
Grass is neutral on Grass

Water is weak against Grass
Grass is weak against Fire
Fire  is weak against Water
```

**Classes Available:**    
```python
class Element(StrEnum):
    GRASS
    FIRE
    WATER

class Move:
    name: str
    element: Element
    
class Pokemon:
    element: Element
    moves: list[Move]
```
